text: Allah hi ney tumharay liye apni peda kerda cheezon mein say saye banaye hain aur ussi ney tumharay liye paharon mein ghaar banaye hain aur ussi ney tumharay liye kurtay banaye hain jo tumhen garmi say bachayen aur aisay kuraty bhi jo tumhen laraee kay waqt kaam aayen. Woh issi tarah apni poori poori nematen dey raha hai kay tum hukum bardaar bann jao
